train: Zane ir skaista gudra gara meitene.
Zane is a beautiful, intelligent, tall girl.
Zēns redz laimīgu čaklu meiteni.
The boy sees a happy, dexterous girl.
Lielā pilsētā ir mazs zaļš parks.
In the big city there is a small green park.
Parkā ir zila upe un sarkanas puķes.
In the park there is a blue river and red flowers.
Pilsētas ielas ir garas un šauras.
The city’s streets are long and narrow.
Parka soli ir brūni.
The park’s benches are brown.
Rīga ir liela un veca pilsēta.
Riga is a big, old city.
Meitenes kleita ir īsa un sarkana.
The girl’s dress is short and red.
Tēvs mīl dēlu.
The father loves the son.
Upē peld mazas laimīgas meitenes un mazi laimīgi zēni.
Small happy girls and small happy boys swim in the river.
test: The boys are intelligent and dexterous.
Zanes kleita ir garā un brūnā.
Zane’s dress is long and brown.
In Riga there is a beautiful, big park.
Zēns redz zaļu soli un zilu upi.
The boy sees a green bench and a blue river.
The boy’s father loves the red flower.
